notes: Review codebase for leftover Cloud Control API references and remove them.

task.name: Remove Cloud Control API references
task.description: The provider originally used the Cloud Control API but now uses native AWS SDK calls. Review the codebase for any leftover references to Cloud Control and remove them.
steps: Search for 'cloudcontrol' or 'CloudControl' references in code
Review any AWS provider pattern references that may be outdated
Remove or update any found references
Verify tests still pass after changes
